title: 1911 T3 Turkey Red Ty Cobb - SGC 3
author: benedini

posts.post_title: 1911 T3 Turkey Red Ty Cobb - SGC 3
posts.post_content:
1911 T3 Turkey Red #9 Ty Cobb w/checklist back. Recently graded (June 2024) SGC 3. This one has been the centerpiece of my collection and never expected to put it up for sale. To me this is the most amazing card ever produced.

SGC population of 11 with only 101 graded in total. 

$17,950 net including shipping. Thanks for looking.

eBay user ID megalodonteeth - multiple successful sales on Net54

No matter what I try pictures of this one are not uploading for some reason but are visible on the eBay listing at [url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/306295937241[/url]
